citation.article-title: An approach to characterizing uncultivated prokaryotes: the Grey Lung agent and proposal of a Candidatus taxon for the organism, ’Candidatus Mycoplasma ravipulmonis’

p.s: Description of Candidatus Mycoplasma ravipulmonis sp. nov.
Candidatus Mycoplasma ravipulmonis (M.L. adj. ravus greyish; M.L. n. pulmo the lung; M.L. compound gen. n. ravipulmonis of a grey lung)
[(Mollicutes) NC; NA; O, wall-less; NAS (GenBank no. AFOOll73), oligonucleotide sequence complementary to unique region of 16S rRNA 5'- CGCTTGGCAACCCATTGTAACCGC-3'; S (MUS musculus, lung); M].
